gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hawks 124, Jazz 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hawks defeated the Jazz, 124-97. Jalen Johnson (22 points, 13 rebounds, six assists) and De’Andre Hunter (20 points, five rebounds) led five Hawks in double figures as Collin Sexton (22 points) and Walker Kessler (14 points, 12 rebounds, two blocks) led the Jazz in the loss. The Hawks improve to 26-32 on the year as the Jazz move to 27-32.
